# Purpose
This application is designed to analyze weather data from various locations. Users can select a location and a date range to visualize and summarize weather metrics.

# Data
The data used in this application is sourced from the Open-Meteo dataset. It includes weather metrics such as temperature, humidity, and wind speed for various locations.

# References
- Open-Meteo: https://open-meteo.com
